name: The Devil's Face
description:
Gamestory

Jonathan, our hero, is a second-generation Christian Orthodox immigrant. He and his brother Christian were involved in a car accident. Jonathan, the driver, was able to escape from the burning vehicle, but Christian was not so lucky. Tragically, Jonathan watched as his brother burned to death. Wracked with guilt over not being able to save his brother and haunted by strange visions, Jonathan decided to end his own life.


However, this began his journey to the afterlife, where he will be judged for his actions and forced to live eternally in the hell, he has created for himself.

The Devil's Face is based on the beliefs of an existing pagan sect and the "The Book of Demons" accounts of the afterlife. It is aimed at players who want to experience a horror game with a deeper meaning.

Attention
This game may trigger seizures in individuals with photosensitive epilepsy. Please play with caution and stop playing if you experience any symptoms. Your health and safety are our top priority. Thank you for your understanding.

Gameplay

The Devil's Face offers a unique and unforgettable experience, taking you on a journey into the afterlife. The atmosphere is hauntingly nostalgic, reminiscent of classic horror games but with a fresh and modern twist. The graphics are eerie and suspenseful, while the sound design will have you on edge. The game features challenging puzzles that will keep you engaged as you explore the environment.


Key Features
  • Immersive first-person gameplay
  • Creepy and atmospheric environment
  • Challenging puzzles to solve
  • Uncover the dark secrets
  • Experience a bone-chilling horror adventure

Immersive first-person gameplay

The gameplay is filled with incredible scenes that will impress even the most demanding players.

Creepy and atmospheric environment

The environment of our game is designed to be creepy and atmospheric, which creates a sense of tension and unease in the player.

Challenging puzzles to solve

If you enjoy challenging puzzles, The Devil's Face is the game for you.

Uncover the dark secrets

The Devil's face is full of hidden dark secrets. Are you ready to uncover them?

Experience a bone-chilling horror adventure

Get ready to face your fears and immerse yourself in a world of darkness and terror. This game promises a thrilling and heart-pumping adventure, with a fresh take on classic horror themes that will have you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

The end for each of you will be different.

Official Discord Server

Creator's message

Dear players, I am the creator of the game and I am proud to present to you our latest work, a horror game inspired by the beliefs of an existing pagan sect and influenced by various movies and games. However, our goal was to give it its own unique identity. This is our first attempt at a serious horror game, and creating it was quite a challenge, especially with our aging computers. The game features an engaging story, with plenty of jump scares and messages to convey. We wanted to bring back the classic horror game experience with a modern twist, so it won't take hours to complete. We've also added some special "gifts" for players in real life. I hope you enjoy playing our game and have a great time.

Best regards,
The creator.
